entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
